title: Add visible Generate Logo button to Logo Concept Generator form

requirements.text: In the Logo Concept Generator form at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/form[1], ensure a clearly visible 'Generate Logo Concept' submit button is present at the bottom of the form. The button must be styled consistently with the app's gold accent theme, be prominently labeled (e.g., 'Generate Logo Concept' or 'Generate Logo'), and trigger the logo concept generation and 10-variant logo showcase when clicked.

quotes: where is the logo generate option

acceptanceCriteria: The Logo Concept Generator form contains a clearly visible submit/generate button at the bottom of the form
The button is labeled with an obvious action label such as 'Generate Logo Concept' or 'Generate Logo'
The button is styled with the app's gold accent color consistent with other tool buttons
Clicking the button triggers the logo concept generation and renders the 10-variant logo showcase
The button shows a loading/disabled state while the generation is in progress
The button is not hidden, obscured, or visually indistinct from surrounding elements

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Do not break any other tool in the application
Maintain the existing dark-themed gold accent design system
nonGoals: Changing the logo concept generation logic or backend
Modifying the 10-variant logo showcase output layout
Adding new form fields to the Logo Concept Generator
